name: development-best-practices-marketplace
description: A curated marketplace for development best practices plugins

plugins.name: code-quality-standards
plugins.description: Code quality check standards and workflow. Use when completing feature implementation, fixing bugs, or before creating commits/PRs.

plugins.name: documentation-guidelines
plugins.description: Documentation creation and update standards. Use when considering creating documentation or when code changes involve documentation.

plugins.name: frontend-architecture-design
plugins.description: Review and redesign frontend project architecture, analyzing performance, maintainability, scalability, engineering, and type safety.

plugins.name: git-commit-conventions
plugins.description: Standardize Git commit message format using Conventional Commits with Chinese subjects.

plugins.name: git-operations-safety
plugins.description: Git operation safety standards. Use before executing any Git operation, especially destructive ones.

plugins.name: language-preferences
plugins.description: Language and interaction standards. Use when communicating with users, explaining code, or reporting errors.

plugins.name: pull-request-guidelines
plugins.description: Standardize Pull Request workflow and content requirements.

plugins.name: typescript-strict-typing
plugins.description: MANDATORY for ALL TypeScript code: Enforces zero-tolerance type safety - prohibits any, as, @ts-ignore, !, implicit any, unsafe operations. Use when writing, fixing, implementing, refactoring any TypeScript code.

plugins.name: electron-webview-debugging
plugins.description: Debug and troubleshoot Electron WebView Tag with script injection, event monitoring, DevTools integration, and IPC communication debugging. Use when developing Electron applications with WebView components.

plugins.name: claude-code-editor
plugins.description: Intelligent code editing and refactoring agent with isolated context execution. Handles large-scale refactoring, batch modifications, pattern replacements, and feature implementations without polluting main conversation.

plugins.name: backend-architecture-design
plugins.description: Review and redesign Python FastAPI backend project architecture, analyzing API design, data architecture, security, async performance, code organization, and testing.
